website_summaries.verdict: Hook design on this inexpensive towel ring makes it easier to grab the towel.
pros: Available in both brushed nickel and polished chrome finishes
All-metal construction gives you a better level of performance
Yields a more contemporary design feel than some other styles of towel rings
cons: Will not fit large towels well, as it's made more for small hand towels

customer_reviews.title: It looks awesome, but know in advance, it protrudes 4 inches from the wall.  That's a lot; normal ones protrude only 2 inches.
customer_reviews.text: This thing really looks regal. Awesome finish, pretty big (like 9-10" wide from end to end). It just juts out so much, which means your elbows or your kids may bump into it quite a bit.. It's fine for my bathroom because of how it's laid out, but if you have a small bathroom, this is going to look too big. Awesome product, though!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: No symmetry for double vanity bathroom with these.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good quality piece, but I gave one star to get your attention as other ratings and product description left out one esthetic information. You CANNOT get symmetrical look for a double vanity bathroom with two of these hook racks. From the photos and design, you think that the base can be flipped upside down to install onto opposite wall (for symmetry look) so the hook can still be inserted. BUT inside the base opening, it is designed to allow the hook insertion with ONLY ONE DIRECTION (this means you cannot flip upside down/change direction). It's just stupid not to make this have symmetry capability.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Curnutte

customer_reviews.title: Just like the rest of the Alteo set this towel ring ...
customer_reviews.text: Just like the rest of the Alteo set this towel ring fits great in our new bathrooms, they were easy to mount, fit flush, finish is great, construction is solid. Perfect product, however slightly pricey ( i guess sometimes you do get what you paid for).
customer_reviews.author: ReddyFire

customer_reviews.title: An excellent towel ring.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic towel ring, completely made of metal and heavy duty. It installs with two well anchored screws (the screws and anchors that come with this set are actually items you can use instead of so many others who supply tiny & weak screws not many would actually put to use). The fit and finish is classic Kohler - excellent. I have many of their items in my bathroom and am happy to report all of them perform great and last a long time - they are simply well made. I think those who choose to try this will not be disappointed. The design is truly beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! This towel holder is made out of aluminum and has a beautiful chrome finish compared to other towel holders in the same price range, which are made out of cheap plastic. The installation was very easy and straight forward & it comes with 2 screws and 2 anchors, so all you need is a drill + drill bit and a Phillips screw driver. It literally took me just a couple of minutes to install it.
customer_reviews.author: A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Falls off the Wall, Wobbles in place
customer_reviews.text: The product attaches to the wall with a set screw that backs itself out after only a few days of use. Ours came with a defect, in which, the screw holding the two piece chrome "C" together is stripped--and can't be tightened. So when the unit sits on the wall the end of the chrome piece moves back and forth. Not sturdy at all. I would not have bought this one if I had known the trouble it was going to be putting it back on the wall every week and waiting for the end piece to fall off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, but NOT able to be flipped.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and sturdy, but I do have one caveat. We bought two of these to go on opposing walls of a very long double sink, thinking we could reverse the "swoop." This is NOT a feature on these rings. The swoop only goes one way and does not move at all, even though there's a screw on it that looks like you could unscrew it and flip it over. We called Kohler and asked after we couldn't get the screw out. So, what ya see is what ya get. GREAT quality and we're just getting used to having one swoop toward the mirror rather than away.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kasten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and it looks great in our remodeled bathrooms. Includes a template which is helpful and two different dry wall mounts in case you need them .Matches the other Alteo fixtures we have. One note, I thought I could reverse the hanger to have it point the other way in some locations (we ordered and installed 6). Unfortunately, the hanger part can be detached, but not turned around to allow it to point the opposite direction. Not a big problem, but one I wasn't aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great look but not sure how long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this hook and the face that it’s narrow (as opposed to a circular ring) and so didn’t take as much vertical space. However, it fell off the wall after a few months. We rigged it up to rehang (bc screw was lost in the fall) but I’m deducting a couple of stars in the meantime. Will update after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Best in a Vest

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hand Towel Holder
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of them. Once installed, they are very nice in appearance and sturdy. Since it's rare you can find a stud in the correct place and have to use mollies, I'd suggest throwing the one's that come with it away and buy some sturdier ones. Home Depot has some "no tools" required that work fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wiggles up against wall
customer_reviews.text: I had my bathroom installer put the towel bars in and he was not able to make this towel ring tight up against the wall. It is very loose and wiggles. The other one that was installed is better but it still is not tight up against the wall.. Very disappointing with a $60,000 bathroom remodel. Nothing he can do about it and showed me the issue with the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Rubie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful elegant design
customer_reviews.text: This item may not work for everyone, but for me it was perfect in a smaller guest bath with limited space for hand towels. The contemporary design looks great with the rest of my bathroom fixtures. It only curves one way (to the left) so make sure that wherever you plan on mounting it, that you keep this in mind. I looked at hundreds of other options and designs, and this one came out on top. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Downing

customer_reviews.title: Great find. Fits our bathroom perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These towel holders were a perfect match to some other fixtures in master bath. So excited! Only had them up for a few months and just love them. I really wanted the towel rings where the towels slide in from the side versus the full ring where you need to pull the towel through. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C M

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, but sticks out quite far from the wall
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, sleek and modern looking towel ring. Installation was quick and easy. The only thing that bothers me is that it does stick out quite a bit from the wall compared to a traditional towel ring. Also, due to the exposed metal hook protruding out from the wall, I'd be a bit nervous if I had young children in the house as I'd be afraid of them putting an eye out if they happened to be playing around in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Bought from open box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from the open box department at Amazon. It was missing a screw but I called Kohler and they replaced it. They did not do it quickly but they did replace it. It was easy to install and looks great in my bathroom. Just the different touch I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tina D

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't expecting to much for the money. Was I surprised! This is durable and so easy to install. It actually comes with everything but the hammer you will need to install it, even a template to hang it even. I highly recommend this item. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and just what we needed for our bathroom. We really like this design and will seek out the other accessories when we decide to update the bathroom. The quality and finish are very nice and I really like the anchors that they provide for mounting the ring on drywall only. The one thing to note though is that the support post that attaches to the wall is not quite in the center of the overall ring as it is positioned more to the right. Keep this in mind when determining a mounting location.
customer_reviews.author: Craig (shigadeyo)

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, versatile, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed two of these, one in each bathroom. One has a super tight space, and I was able to configure the ring sideways (open-end up) and it looks purposeful. I will say, the one that's configured as manufactured is a little rickety where the arm meets the wall attachment and we haven't been able to trouble-shoot it. It's fine, I don't think it will fall down, but I'd rather it not seem loose.
customer_reviews.author: RachelAZD

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid towel hanger
customer_reviews.text: When we had our house built, the builder wanted like $100 to put in a hand towel holder. That's just crazy. I bought this one from the exact same collection for much less and installed it in about 15 minutes. Very solid and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be secured on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice - and that is the reason i bought it. It was installed by my contractor and so i cannot really comment on how easy that was. In a week or two after installation, the piece fell off the wall. There is a small shoot up piece inside the assembly that I cannot loosen now and so no option to reinstall it. I agree with all these 1 star reviews here and it seems we all have the same issue. This holder just cannot stay on the wall. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shape and holds a hand towel nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, modern, pretty. I really like this product. I love the shape and I think it adds some classy bling to my bathroom. No regrets buying it, holds a hand towel nicely and just a little different to make it interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie B

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less that 2 years
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these just under two years ago, and in the past few months two of them have broken. And when I say broken, I mean the metal itself where the hook part joins to the base of the hook that attaches to the wall has broken so they can't be fixed. Have had issues with the base loosening and falling off the wall but that can be re-installed. Anyway, a lifetime of less than two years is pretty poor. Obviously would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mathgirl

customer_reviews.title: Hope you don't need one on each side!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this entire line. I liked the look. BIG problem-- I wanted to hang one on each side of the vanity. WRONG! There is a screw that looks like you can change it to hang on the right or the left. WRONG AGAIN! It comes apart and would so easy to do but it's cut so it only fits one way. HOW STUPID......
customer_reviews.author: sandi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in remodeled bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great on the wall. We had shower doors that we replaced with a shower rod, so there was no place to put a hand towel. This looks nice and matches other things in the bathrooms tightening this was a little tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hochstedler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Classy
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful towel rings and look very classy! I actually use them for body towels and the rings are big enough for the towels to fit just right. I (a petite woman) installed it myself no problem, 5 mins/ring; find stud, use the template to drill 2 holes, attach plate to wall and tighten ring onto wall plate. Very, very simple. And you can loosen the pin that holds the ring so it can swing a bit instead of being stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but cheaply made. Super light weight if this is what your looking for and the hardware included is cheap. I replaced it with something more substantial. Not what I expected of the kohler name. I suppose if your flipping a house its great cheap in price and craftsman ship but for your own home i would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: angelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and classy look
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful in my newly renovated bathroom. It swivles a bit though and I don't know how to anchor it properly so it does not.
customer_reviews.author: WestieMom

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 and Not One Will Stay Secure
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of this style and they just don’t stay secure no matter how hard I tighten the set screw. Tighten it as much as humanly possibly and they still start to wobble. I finally threw them all away.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Adams

customer_reviews.title: these are similar if not the same as the HomeDepot Mistos Series (at better prices). They design is sleek
customer_reviews.text: Most of my bathrooms are finished off with towel rings, towel bars, toilet paper holders of the Alteo-series. In fact, these are similar if not the same as the HomeDepot Mistos Series (at better prices). They design is sleek, modern and are easy to install with the wall-templates included in the instructions. One weakness is the connection between the main part and the ring. This connection is held in place by a tiny machine screw, however, because of pulling on the towel the ring has broken off twice already requiring replacement of the complete product.
customer_reviews.author: m_bos7

customer_reviews.title: looks nice installed
customer_reviews.text: The towel rong installed easily and looks great! It feels more solid that other towel rings that I have installed! I will purchas and install this model again!
customer_reviews.author: D. Stinnett

customer_reviews.title: snapped off
customer_reviews.text: never could get this to stop wiggling. the wall mount is firm but there is a setscrew holding the "half loop" in place. this never held the hook firmly. finally snapped one off (installed about 2 years ago). loved the look but not sure I'll order one again as a replacement. looking for options.
customer_reviews.author: C T L

customer_reviews.title: It looks like they have brushed nickel as an accent but they ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Alteo chrome towel ring, along with the towel bars that are advertised the same. The photo's are deceiving. It looks like they have brushed nickel as an accent but they do not. They are pure chrome without any accents at all. Well built and pretty but not what I thought I was ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Alice ThompsonTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Practical
customer_reviews.text: We love the look of this product. We bought two, one for the new remodel of our bathroom and one for when we remodel the other bathroom. This is a beautiful towel holder, modern looks and very durable. And it is a Kohler, great brand will last a lifetime unlike the towel rods that must be painted.
customer_reviews.author: crossfiregal

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Husband says it was easy to install. It's very pretty. Those are the only nice things to say about this product. It's cheap and lasted less than 1 year in my household (my husband and myself, no kids).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy intall. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of the matching towel racks, and they work and look well. Nice modern look. They're pretty solid, with a good quality finish. Have had these for a about a year now, and still really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Matte Black

customer_reviews.title: So elegant
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I didn’t realize it didn’t swing when I purchased like most others of its kind, but I still love it. I use it as a hand towel holder.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and I’m impressed. This one got my vote
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, very fancy looking and it’s all metal. So I don’t know how the other review broke off between the mount and the hook towel.
customer_reviews.author: Maculet

customer_reviews.title: it was still nice and fit our needs so we kept it
customer_reviews.text: It looks little bigger than we expected, however, it was still nice and fit our needs so we kept it. We have been using it for over a month and so far no issues. easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Kutkova

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the towel holder and toilet paper holder to spruce up our powder room. This is a nice heavy holder and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary look>
customer_reviews.text: MODERN/CONTEMPORARY LOOK. But make sure you secure it to a stud.... It does make a statement in my bathroom. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Spontin

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this towel ring
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this towel ring! I kicked my old Ikea one to the curb! It looks expensive and very elegant. It also has a beautiful gleaming finish which I like and matches all of my other bathroom fixtures. Installation was easy, although I found Kohler's instructions very confusing. FYI - I did not use the anchors that were provided, only two screws, which I think will do the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wong

customer_reviews.title: looks good but BUT>>>>
customer_reviews.text: after you put the base plate up you mount the ring and tighten the allen screw but it is still a little loose but works fine
customer_reviews.author: jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good looking in our "beach cottage contemporary" half-bath. It was easy to install. I upgraded the wall anchors to a beefier type. I recommend hitting a wall stud if at all possible, using a good quality wood screw. If not, throw away the plastic anchors that come with it and get something with a much heavier load rating.
customer_reviews.author: Quartet Bari

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice towel ring. It is fairly good sized so you will want to check the measurements to make sure it fits your needs. The chrome is very nice and heavy feeling and very shiny. It does not feel or look like cheap metal. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our bathrooms and replaced ugly towel bars with these. I love the look and the anchors it came with to secure it to the wall. Very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KOHLER Alteo Towel Ring Hand Towel Holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful hand towel holder. It's heavy and the he Nickel color metal appears to be of great quality. Worth every dime!
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.  Higher price but quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. I didn't love the wall anchors. I bought the set and several of them broke while installing. Suggested/standard install height should be included on the instructions but a Google search worked too.
customer_reviews.author: Harv

customer_reviews.title: Installation was at first somewhat of a struggle, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was at first somewhat of a struggle, but the instructions were very clear and it helped a lot. Working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: looks nice and sturdy though I am a little skeptical about the place where the ring is attached to the holder. I could not tighten it nor do i I know if it can be tightened (hence the 4 stars). I will update in 3-4 months as I have 8 of these and want to watch this before I rate it 5.
customer_reviews.author: Satish

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought towel racks, tissue holder and this hand towel holder. All are superior products. Made well and are pretty. Easy to put in also. These should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: westtexaskat

customer_reviews.title: I love the style
customer_reviews.text: This matches our new house perfectly, without being the same style. I love the style. It was very easy to secure to the wall, and very sturdy. I like the design to attach it to the wall mount, much better than what we are currently using. It can be mounted so that the hook faces the opposite way for the other side.
customer_reviews.author: RatherDashing

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: I bought this type of ring because the other one (Kohler K-37050-CP Alteo 18 "Towel Bar, Polished Chrome) was too big for the place. But he is very handsome, is serving perfectly for the face towel.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia krutman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome despite poor install guide
customer_reviews.text: Installation directions were poor. But once I figured out how it actually assembled, I was able to get it nice and secure. It is sleek and sexy. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Winters

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful towel holder. We installed it between medicine cabinets in the bathroom for hand towel. Really looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: KOHLER Alteo Towel Ring Hand Towel Holder,
customer_reviews.text: As a Kohler product its good quality, easy to installed. I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it’s good and matches everything else we bought in nickel finish
customer_reviews.text: The one we got was a little loose where the two pieces connect and I can’t seem to tighten that part. Other than that it’s good and matches everything else we bought in nickel finish.
customer_reviews.author: Traviscf

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish - great upgrade to builder "$1.99" towel ring
customer_reviews.text: Easy to replace. The fasteners/anchors are little different than the once from our DIY store, they work great too, but make sure you follow the instructions how to fold them before inserting into the wall. In case your bathroom was repainted with the old towel rings and you just plan to swap the towel ring, you may need to have extra paint for the touch-up. Got refurbished from Amazon Warehouse - all spotless with all accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, and mounting was easy
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, and mounting was easy, but I'm concerned that the joint between the hook and the mounting base is going to wiggle loose. It's not designed to swing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mahnken

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!
customer_reviews.text: We were remodeling the guest bathroom and I wanted something of better quality than the typical fixtures. I found this one and loved it. It has a very unique style and I loved the fact that you could just slide the towel on it instead of having to feed the towel through. It made it easier for the kids. When we received it, it looks beautiful. It feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Cook

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and love how secure it is in the wall
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek design and secure in the wall. Like that it doesn't flop around (at all) since that often scuffs up the wall.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We really like the style of this towel ring. It has a substantial look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: SubterraneanMuskrat

customer_reviews.title: Low profile sleek and modern look
customer_reviews.text: High quality beautiful brushed nickel. Sleek and modern. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chic design and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the super chic design and it hasn’t been a disappointment. It’s sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Cumberbatch

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Unique style - better than anything I have seen in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Scholten

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. The only reason why i did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The only reason why i did not put a 5 is because it almost moked my eye the other day. I should have gone for a full circle instead. Good quality again.
customer_reviews.author: Klito

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style and construction. Towels look good on it.
customer_reviews.author: gray ghost

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a little larger than I expected, but the finish is very lovely and it looks super stylish in our updated bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The design is sleek and holds the towel in place.
customer_reviews.author: Grapesoda

customer_reviews.title: Towel Ring
customer_reviews.text: round body that is attached ... wiggles ... tightened as much as possible, but wonder if it is suppose to wiggle a little? anybody know? Looks good and got fast service ... just wondering if it should be returned
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and durable. Returned for the Eva model to match other items already installed. If this matches your decor go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful towel ring, great finish. i bought 2 and i love them! I have Moen spot resist brushed nickel faucets and i was concerned this wouldn't match but it looks good. You don't notice that they are slightly different unless you hold them next to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and so elegant. They look fantastic in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Eleese Lester

customer_reviews.title: Awesome... no more boring ring!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have grown to hate the boring rings that you have to pull a towel thru. This is different and looks great. Sturdy and easy tho install. Ordering more to put on other bathrooms
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: ... local and online when we remodeled our bathroom and love these fixtures
customer_reviews.text: We bought the whole set from various vendors both local and online when we remodeled our bathroom and love these fixtures. They are elegant and high quality, we love the way they look and feel. It's quite easy to install and includes any and all necessary hardware to stick this to the wall. We loved this style so much that we are going with it for the rest of our home too. They are on the expensive side but look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer

customer_reviews.title: That I figured it out anyway
customer_reviews.text: Nice hook and it came with instructions for installing a door knob. Cool
customer_reviews.author: rdynlex

customer_reviews.title: Looks great Not as sturdy as it should be
customer_reviews.text: The towel holder has some give to it. Doesn’t seem sturdy. Otherwise looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! We just moved into a high rise that has all things Kohler in the bathroom and kitchen and we got this hand towel “ring” for the bathroom as a little addition. PERFection! Sleek and chic!!! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jon O.

customer_reviews.title: Large and quality tower ring
customer_reviews.text: Works well for a large hand towel to wipe wet hands besides the mirror
customer_reviews.author: Marie Chang

customer_reviews.title: Not bad if you want a highly visible holder
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be just right for my small bathroom and, while it functions fine, the design is rather bulky and is too obvious for my taste. I'll be returning, looking for hardware that's a little more subtle. If you're looking for a holder that lets the towel take center stage (for function or decor), this one's not it.
customer_reviews.author: Truestory

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but I couldn't loosen the set screw to turn the mounting part of the ring in the opposite direction.
customer_reviews.author: John Park

customer_reviews.title: Hang it up!
customer_reviews.text: Decent price (on sale)....slightly heavy-duty, but nice design and functionality. Had bought a "oil-rubbed" bronze for downstairs bathroom, so this was a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Louis Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, installation was fast and easy, well made, I am ordering more items from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Good shape
customer_reviews.text: Very nice towel ring. It was easy to install and the shape of the "ring" for the towel is good... the hand towel doesn't get as bunched up as with a circle shaped towel ring.
customer_reviews.author: BBmb

customer_reviews.title: Just looks good.
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose. Looks good. It is very difficult to install. It's hard to screw the set screw in.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Hartig

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty and great quality. And it looks nice too
customer_reviews.author: lacey lamere

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Looks so beautiful in our newly remodeled bathroom! The Alteo style by Kohler is not only gorgeous but great quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tealady

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Kohler does not disappoint!! This is absolutely stunning when installed! High quality - well worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Karstetter

customer_reviews.title: Wonerfully modern look
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer mentioned, it looks in the picture on Amazon like the piece near the wall is another material. The entire piece is chrome and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and was easy to install into my drywall with ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and was easy to install into my drywall with the anchors. It feels very secure in the wall. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece
customer_reviews.text: Attached to the stud this becomes an immovable solid piece,to stay put forever
customer_reviews.author: Joe Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: I like it it is really stylish
customer_reviews.text: I like it it is really stylish. But it is a bit bigger than I expected. So dont recommend for small bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hardware
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this towel hook. It is beautiful and sturdy. It does not look cheap or flimsy like some I have seen. Installation is fairly simple. I bought the matching toilet paper holder and towel bar and they all look great in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Kohler 5 Star!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the whole set. Kohler is top notch product. Bathroom looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish hand towel holder. The only downside is that the holder seems a little wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Thrift

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is simple and elegant and the hand towel doesn’t slide off as you’re trying to dry your hands.
customer_reviews.author: NekVon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition to the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to the bathroom. All metal and solid construction. Very easy to mount, and included all hardware to mount into drywall, studs, and tile. Overall - very pleased with purchase. Will definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: F. U.

customer_reviews.title: Great Style
customer_reviews.text: Unique style without being too modern. Great finish and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Youngz

customer_reviews.title: Great towel bar
customer_reviews.text: Love these individual towel bars. Stunning on the wall, and roomy for large towels, smaller towels look good on them as well. The best thing is that the towel is held out from the wall so that the towel is easy to grasp, and the towel has air space to dry. These look good either with a folded towel or one bunched on.
customer_reviews.author: BCA

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but the connection for the handle piece doesn't tighten ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these products at separate times. Looks great but the connection for the handle piece doesn't tighten firmly enough. Expected better connection from Kohler but overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE PRODUCTS ORDERED FOR ALL 3 OF MY BATHROOMS
customer_reviews.author: b.donato

product_meta.title: Towel Ring by KOHLER, Bathroom Towel Ring, Alteo Collection, Polished Chrome, K-37057-CP
product_meta.description:
Color:Polished ChromeStreamlined for contemporary style, Alteo accessories match Alteo faucets to provide a coordinated look for your bathroom. Constructed of durable metal, this eye catching towel ring features an open ended design that allows easy access to your towel.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The sleek aesthetic of Alteo accessories complements bath and powder rooms with a more contemporary theme. This Alteo towel ring coordinates with Alteo faucets to unify your bath or powder room décor.
feature_bullets: DURABILITY: KOHLER finishes resist corrosion and tarnish for lasting durability
DESIGN: Simple, elegant 8 to 1/2 inch open ring design
MATCH THE ALTEO COLLECTION: Coordinates with other products, including faucets and additional accessories, in the Alteo collection
EASY INSTALLATION: Quick, easy installation with included tools and installation guide
USER FRIENDLY: A contemporary, open ended design for user ease
MATERIAL: Premium metal construction for durability
DIMENSIONS: 8 to 1/2 inches (217 millimeter) x 3 to 1/8 inches (78 millimeter) x 6 to 1/8 inches (155 millimeter)
